text: Iye yekha ndiye amene amadziwa za ola. Ndipo palibe mtengo umene umabereka zipatso kapena chachikazi kuima kapena kubala popanda Iye kudziwa. Ndipo pa tsiku limene adzawafunsa onse kuti, “Kodi ali kuti amene munkati ndi anzanga?” Iwo adzayankha kuti, “Ife tili kunenetsa kwa Inu kuti palibe aliyense pakati pathu amene angachitire umboni.”
